message.body: Hi I apologize for the late response. I have been in meetings all day. How are you?
Oh okay..no worries I'm well. I'm just leaving work now. How were the meetings?
Long. Haha I am a researcher that the school of public health In Michigan. So I work with study participants but the meetings are kind of to keep investo
rs and partners posted on the logistics of the project.
Cool I have a 2 gigs working with agressive youth.Resources for Human Development and Devereux.
What type of education does your position require?
I'm actually still an undergrad. Senior. But my professor is in charge of the study, and I started working with him when it was still a proposal a few ye
ars ago and now I'm a huge part of the project. But generally a position such as this would require a masters in public health.
Wow..it sounds like an amazing opportunity to have come across.
I'm taking nursing pre reqs now with the hopes of moving into an accelerated bsn. My undergrad was in social work.
I'm aware that some universities offer grad dual programs involving public health Are u considering grad school?
Wow, that sounds amazing. What kind of courses are you taking? Yes I am interested in public health, thinking of dual degree maybe but the program I have
my sights set on is Harvard they have an mph program in global health and infectious diseases. And I'm also premed, so I'm taking lots of science course
s. Are they somewhat similar to your nursing prereqs?
Nice! I'm doing statistics now... Then a basic bio and a basic chem.. onto anatomay& physiology 1&2, micro bio, nutrition
